uniequip_002_ray.name: 巡哨伙伴
uniequip_002_ray.upgradeDescription: Can summon a Sand Beast within Attack Range for 25 seconds. The Sand Beast scouts the area and extends Ray's Attack Range. Ray will prioritize targets within the scouting area and deal increased Physical damage by 18%. Sandbeast redeployment time -5 seconds
